properties.description: PyMuPDF is a high-performance Python library for data extraction, analysis, conversion & manipulation of PDF (and other) documents.
properties.keywords: PDF Text Extraction, PDF Image Extraction, PDF Conversion, PDF Tables, PDF Splitting, PDF Creation, Pyodide, PyScript
properties.author: Artifex
